sentences.english: Snowcapped mountain tops glisten in the strong Alpine sunshine.

sentences.english: Let freedom ring from every hill and mole- hill of Mississippi.

sentences.english: Each hill of the diagram building represents a mega-city.

sentences.english: After a fierce charge, our soldiers drove the enemy from the hill-top.
sentences.chinese: 在猛烈的衝鋒後，我們的士兵把敵人趕下了山頭。
